Package game.dinosaurs

Class Pterodactyl

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.Dinosaur
game.dinosaurs.Pterodactyl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, Visitable
public class Pterodactyl
extends Dinosaur
A tiny flying dinosaur. It can fly across the map and transverse through water to eat fish and quench thirst. Can be eaten by Allosaur as whole. It can eat corpse of dinosaurs but slowly.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Every turn for Pterodactyl, it will check if this Pterodactyl should has the capability fly
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      The action to be performed by this Allosaur this turn.

    • setFlyingTurns

      private void setFlyingTurns()
      Determines Pterodactyl flying turns. Decrements if above 30, restore to 30 if it is on tree, else remove capability fly when below or equal 0.

    • executePreEatingAction

      public void executePreEatingAction()
      Perform actions that Pterodactyls display before eating.

      protected boolean isAdult()
      Checks if the Dinosaur is in adult growth stage with their age.
      Specified by:
      isAdult in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      True if age is larger or equal growth stage of adult Pterodactyl. False otherwise.

      protected boolean isAlive()
      Checks if Pterodactyl is alive with turns they have been unconscious.
      Specified by:
      isAlive in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      True if the turns they have been unconscious are less than 20. False otherwise.
